title: How Google Plans To Use AI To Reinvent The $3 Trillion US Healthcare Industry
description: Google is betting that the future of healthcare is going to be structured data and AI. The company is applying AI to disease detection, new data infrastructure, and potentially insurance.

title: Healthcare Prices Hit Highest Annual Growth Rate Since Jan 2012
description: The annual growth rate for healthcare prices hit a six-year high in March 2018 as hospital prices remained high.

title: Telehealth: Clear use, questionable ROI
description: As the need for connectivity has grown in certain situations, clear use cases for telehealth have been made.

title: 150 top places to work in healthcare | 2018
description: nThrive named 150 top places to work in healthcare! Check it out in this next article!

title: Visit nThrive at ACDIS, May 21-24, 2018 in San Antonio, TX!
description: Learn how nThrive can address the evolving needs of your Clinical Documentation Integrity (CDI) program through a combination of technology, advisory services, outsourcing, staff education and analytics.

title: nThrive colleagues come together during a storm response community outreach initiative
description: Unifour One is a non-profit, non-partisan, Advocacy and Education organization headquartered in Greensboro, NC. Learn how you can help those affected by the tornado here.

title: 2018 NAHAM Annual Conference
description: Request a private appointment or demo with nThrive at NAHAM, May 3 - 6, 2018 in Denver, CO.

title: Oklahoma State University Medical Center takes patient, payor collections to the next level
description: Read how the use of integrated patient access, charge integrity, compliance and contract management solutions helped OSUMC drive performance gains across their revenue cycle.

title: Late MACRA notices, outreach could put docs on hook for IT upgrades
description: The CMS is gearing up to inform providers whether they must comply with MACRA, but clinicians are bristling both at the agency's timeline for sharing the information and its notification plans.

title: U.S. News adding patient ratings to online doctor profiles
description: 10 patient experience metrics will be added like a follow-up. Learn more!

title: The Role of the Hospital Chargemaster in Revenue Cycle Management
description: The hospital chargemaster rests at the center of revenue cycle management, setting the prices for all services and items provided to patients during an encounter.

title: 3 Strategies to Decrease Low-Value Care, Healthcare Costs
description: Using clinical guidelines, clinical decision support, and patient engagement tools are key ways that provider organizations can reduce wasteful spending on low-value care.

title: 10 Signs Your Revenue Cycle Needs a New Perspective
description: Our checklist "10 Signs Your Revenue Cycle Needs a New Perspective" reveals the key obstacles that may be inhibiting your cash flow and how the right partner can help you overcome them.

title: Millennials are more satisfied with health plans, out-of-pocket costs than baby boomers
description: The majority (53 percent) of millennials are extremely or very satisfied with out-of-pocket costs. Learn more in this next article!

title: Bringing Profee, Facility Together to Maximize Coding Productivity
description: UC San Diego Health upped coding productivity by 74 percent and improved clean claim rates by integrating professional and facility coding under one workflow.

title: How Chatbots can Aid Value-based Care Initiatives
description: Learn how chatbots can benefit the patients experience in this next article!

title: Communication Will Enhance the Doctor-Patient Relationship
description: These days, patients expect an excellent customer experience. As consumers of medical care, they do their homework. Patients are looking for a partner who listens and advocates for them.

title: Pop health vendors see opportunity in independent ambulatory sector
description: Data analytics is the most mature segment of the market, but still largely focused on reporting, Chilmark Research finds.

title: Study finds 'pervasive' income disparities in pediatric hospitalizations
description: The report suggests that hospitals should spend more time on inpatient to outpatient transitions and on population health.

title: Patient-to-Payment Solutions
description: nThrive Solutions help hospitals and health care providers with a combination of revenue cycle services, technology, education, analytics and advisory services. Let us transform your revenue cycle with a holistic approach and boost your organization's financial and operational efficiency from Patient-to-Payment℠.

title: Artificial Intelligence in Health Care: A Cure for Data Pains
description: Learn how artificial intelligence can help your organization achieve success.

title: CMS Extends the MIPS 2017 Data Submission Deadline from March 31 to April 3 at 8 PM EDT
description: If you're an eligible clinician participating in the Quality Payment Program, you now have until Tuesday, April 3, 2018 at 8 PM EDT to submit your 2017 MIPS performance data.

title: Price Transparency Crucial to Healthcare Consumerism Success
description: A new brief from Rice University's Baker Institute for Public Policy explained that providers and stakeholders need price transparency to drive effective healthcare consumerism.

title: Hospital Care at Home Cuts Healthcare Costs in Half
description: Healthcare costs dropped by 52 percent for acutely ill patients who received hospital care in their own homes as part of a small trial at Brigham and Women's Hospital.

title: Urgent care center market on track to hit $26B by 2023
description: This year's severe flu season is driving growth in the acute care segment of the market, according to a new report.

title: How technology will drive the future of population health management
description: Organizations responsible for the care of large groups of people – health plans, hospitals and health systems, large employers, and physicians' groups – currently have more breakthrough technology at their fingertips designed specifically to improve health outcomes than at any point in history.

title: 7 Ways to Minimize Patient Safety Risks
description: Providing for the health of patients is obviously job number one in every medical practice. But what some may find surprising is that without proper attention, the same environment can pose threats to patients and visitors. Learn more here!

title: An analysis finds Face time and compassion are key in online doctor reviews
description: Consumers are looking for a positive interaction with providers, just as much as a medical experience, a new analysis of nearly 7 million online patient reviews shows.
